# `testPkgApp`

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of `testPkgApp` is to demonstrate how to build and test a shiny application using `usethis`, `shiny::testServer()`, and `shinytest2`.

## Installation

You don't want to install this package, but you might want to download it as an example (or read through this `README` to learn about it's contents).

## Run the app

```{r , eval = FALSE}
testPkgApp::runShinyApp()
```
